env.#1: Uncomment following line if you want to change the purge type.
env.#2: By default it will use `local` purge when running locally
env.#5: Uncomment following line if you want to enable translation-aware behavior for HTTP cache.
env.#7: When using Redis or memcached adapter, you can configure it using DSN:
env.#10: Needed by Doctrine Bundle / ORM to prevent it from opening a connection during situations where there is no service yet.

post-install-output: 1. Configure the database connection via <comment>DATABASE_URL</> in your <comment>.env</> file.
<warning>This will overwrite some of the files.</warning> If you modified any of these reject and update manually.
